command.name: loadcharset
command.description: You can change your console font from within ezQuake. Put all your charset images in qw/textures/charsets/*.png (and *.tga) and use /loadcharset XXX to load XXX.png (or tga). "/loadcharset original" will restore the 8bit font in your gfx.wad (this is default). Note that the /loadcharset command is just a 'shortcut' for the new gl_consolefont variable.
